tags.name: kemet-draggable
tags.description: A draggable element with the ability to remember its position.

properties.name: memory
properties.description: A unique identifier used to store the element's position in local storage.

properties.name: top
properties.description: The elements top position in pixels.

properties.name: left
properties.description: The element's left position in pixels.

properties.name: measure
properties.description: If set to true, will measure the width and height of the element's content and apply it to the host element.

events.name: kemet-draggable-start
events.description: Fires when the user starts dragging the element.

events.name: kemet-draggable-stop
events.description: Fires when the user stops dragging the element.
